mapper.select: SELECT r.restaurant_id, r.restaurant_name AS restaurant_name, r.address AS restaurant_address, r.status AS restaurant_status, m.restaurant_menu_item_id, m.name AS restaurant_menu_item_name, m.price AS restaurant_menu_item_price, m.description AS restaurant_menu_item_description, m.image AS restaurant_menu_item_image, m.status AS restaurant_menu_item_status FROM restaurant r LEFT JOIN restaurant_menu_item m ON r.restaurant_id = m.restaurant_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{id}

SELECT r.restaurant_id, r.restaurant_name AS restaurant_name, r.address AS restaurant_address, r.status AS restaurant_status, m.restaurant_menu_item_id, m.name AS restaurant_menu_item_name, m.price AS restaurant_menu_item_price, m.description AS restaurant_menu_item_description, m.image AS restaurant_menu_item_image, m.status AS restaurant_menu_item_status FROM restaurant r LEFT JOIN restaurant_menu_item m ON r.restaurant_id = m.restaurant_id WHERE r.status::text = #{status}
